valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 16 Oct 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 17 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: High Malin 1031 slow moving, declining 1028 by midnight tonight. New high expected Faeroes 1028 by same time
